Very beneficial for vision
Positively affects the nervous system and helps with insomnia
Has a pleasant aroma

en.instruction1_details_description:
All types of Portioned Tea are brewed the same way.
Use 1 portion of tea per 200â€“250 ml of water.
Warm up your teapot or cup by rinsing it with hot water.
Portioned Tea is not afraid of boiling water, but itâ€™s better to let it cool slightly â€” about 95Â°C or higher.
Place one portion of tea into a warm empty teapot or gaiwan and pour in hot water.
After 10â€“15 seconds, pour out the first infusion (donâ€™t
drink it) â€” this rinses the tea.
For the second brew, pour hot water again and steep for 30 seconds to 1
minute, then enjoy your tea. The longer you steep, the stronger
and richer the taste.
For the third and following infusions, steep for 30 seconds to 2 minutes.
You can rebrew the same portion up to 4â€“5 times throughout the day.
Enjoy your tea time! â˜•
en.instruction2_details_title: How to properly brew â—Blue Tea Anchanâ—?
en.instruction2_details_description:
1 teaspoon (2â€“4 g) per 250â€“300 ml. You can brew it with boiling water.
Let it steep for about 2 minutes â€” then your delicious and very healthy tea is ready to drink.
You can brew the same portion twice during the day.
Lemon or a spoon of honey goes perfectly with this tea.
Enjoy your tea time! â˜•💙
